subject: creative suite 3
body:
Those who spiritualize tell spiritual lies, because they lack spiritual eyes.
Perfection is immutable. But for things imperfect, change is the way to perfect them.
The people to fear are not those who disagree with you, but those who disagree with you and are too cowardly to let you know.
Only a generation of readers will span a generation of writers.
If you don't get a kick out of the job you're doing you'd better hunt for another one.
Children have more need of models than of critics.
Anger is a momentary madness, so control your passion or it will control you.
Old age isn't so bad when you consider the alternatives.
You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
There's a Bible on the shelf there. But I keep it next to Voltaire-poison and antidote.
The world is round and the place which may seem like the end may also be only the beginning.
These repetitive words and phrases are merely methods of convincing the subconscious mind.
There has to be evil so that good can prove its purity above it.
Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.
We are Divine enough to ask and we are important enough to receive.
Clothes and manners do not make the man but when he is made, they greatly improve his appearance
No iron chain, or outward force of any kind, can ever compel the soul of a person to believe or to disbelieve.
No one will persist long in helping someone who will not help themselves.
Self-command is the main discipline.
